description: This file defines a React context for theming, including a ThemeContext, a ThemeProvider component, a default theme hook, and a public hook for consuming the theme.

methods.name: useThemeDefaults
methods.description: Returns the default theme object with predefined color values.

methods.name: ThemeProvider
methods.description: A React functional component that provides the theme context to its children.

methods.name: useTheme
methods.description: A custom hook to access the theme context.
